uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.MapScreen
      • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameScreen
extends MapScreen
    The GameScreen is the screen, where the main action takes place. It offers different PowerUps on designated places. There are also a lot of dots, that are supposed to be eaten by PacMan to get into the next level.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameScreen

        public GameScreen(PacManGame game,
                  Assets assets,
                  java.lang.String path)
        Initializes the GameScreen depending on the level. It sets the moving speed of the actors and the number of ghosts and each ghost's difficulty.
        Parameters:
        game - the running PacManGame
        assets - asset management
        path - the path where the map is stored

    • Method Detail

      • isPacManSuper

        public boolean isPacManSuper()

      • setPauseActive

        public void setPauseActive(boolean bool)

      • updateCoolDown

        private void updateCoolDown()
        Updates the timer of the cool-down and checks, if the different time thresholds are reached. Compares the remaining cool-down time with the amount of items on the map and acts according to it.

      • updateHunter

        private void updateHunter()
        Updates the timer of the hunting buff and checks if the time is up. Changes back to normal PacMan after the Hunter-Item-Time is over. Ghosts also return to the difficulty they previously had and stop running away.

      • updateSloMo

        private void updateSloMo()
        Updates the timer of the SloMo buff and checks if the time is up. After the SloMo buff ends, the Ghosts return to their normal speed.

      • handleInput

        protected boolean handleInput()
        Additional pause activation via SPACE bar.
        Overrides:
        handleInput in class MapScreen
        Returns:
        true if there has been action

      • activateBuff

        public void activateBuff(Tile.Item buffType)
        Buffs of the different items that can be picked up.
        Overrides:
        activateBuff in class MapScreen
        Parameters:
        buffType - the type of buff

      • render

        public void render(float delta)
        Checks for updates on the screen, renders the game and updates the hud.
        Specified by:
        render in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
        Overrides:
        render in class MapScreen
        Parameters:
        delta - time parameter used by libGDX

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Game over when time hits 0, Level up when all dots are eaten. When Pause is active the PauseScreen is opened.
        Overrides:
        update in class MapScreen
        Parameters:
        dt - time parameter used by libGDX
